thread.title: Whip up great campsite meals with Coleman propane stoves from $60 (Up to 30% off)
thread.title_full: Whip up great campsite meals with Coleman propane stoves from $60 (Up to 30% off)

title: Whip up great campsite meals with Coleman propane stoves from $60 (Up to 30% off)
text:
Folks itching to get to the campsite and still be able to whip up a good meal can head over to Amazon and grab Coleman’s Triton 2-Burner Propane Camping Stove for $59.99 shipped . Price drops this low are rare on this unit, with today’s deal only being beaten by a Prime member exclusive offer around $55 in the past. And in terms of savings, you’re looking at $20 off or 25% in savings when compared with the $80 going rate. Outfitted with 22,000 total BTUs of cooking power, this stove wields two burners that are ready to accomodate a 12- and 10-inch pan at the same time. Once you’ve hooked up a 16-ounce propane cylinder you can anticipate up to an hour of cooking using the high setting. Perhaps the best part of this model is its portable design that collapses into what looks like a briefcase when not in use. This means it won’t take up much space in storage or when traveling to and from your next campsite. Keep on reading to find yet another Coleman cooking solution available for 30% off .
We’ve also spotted the Coleman 4-in-1 Portable Propane Camping Stove for $69.99 shipped . Typically fetching closer to $100, this offer shaves $30 off today’s spending. You’ll also be happy to hear that this marks a return to the Amazon low we’ve seen just a couple of times before. Forfeit the collapsible design of the unit above to score four different types of cooking with this Coleman stove. It functions as a stove, wok, griddle, and grill, allowing you to make all sorts of food while away from home.
Now that camping season is upon us, it’s no surprise that the deals above are far from the only Coleman discounts up for grabs right now. In fact, we’ve already covered 43% off Coleman’s Kompact Sleeping Bag . You can score it for $28.50 , with even more styles from $35 . And if you’re in need of a tent or canopy, we’ve got you covered with Coleman-branded solutions as low as $65 shipped .
Coleman Triton 2-Burner Propane Camping Stove features: TWO WIND GUARDS: Help shield and protect burners from wind HEAVY-DUTY LATCH: Easy to open and keeps the stove closed when not in use EASY TO CLEAN: Durable, chrome-plated grate is removable for easy cleanup IMPROVED KNOB ROTATION: For precise temperature and simmering control of two independently adjustable burners POWERFUL STOVE: 22,000 total BTUs of cooking power SIZE: Fits 12-inch and 10-inch pan BURN TIME: Up to 1 hour on high on one 16 oz. propane cylinder (sold separately)
